name: inappropriately
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is unsuitable, or wrong in a particular situation: an effort to stop them spending money inappropriately There is nothing to suggest the attorney acted inappropriately in the case. See
inappropriate
More examplesFewer examplesIt looks like the computer was accessed inappropriately, but we haven’t lost any data.He behaved inappropriately towards female colleagues.Some children at the show were shouting and behaving inappropriately. The administrator handled the situation badly and inappropriately.
